circumstances: On approach to Michigan City on a cargo flight from Traverse City, both engines stopped almost simultaneously. The airplane lost height, struck tree tops and crashed few dozen yards short of runway. The pilot, sole on board, was seriously injured and the airplane was destroyed.
probable_cause:
Both engines failed on final due to mismanagement of fuel. The following factors were reported:
- Inattentive to fuel supply, 
- Fuel exhaustion, 
- High obstructions, 
- Lack of familiarity with aircraft,
- Pilot misunderstood fuel gauge placard.
